body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to Car Deals Inc. My name is Wayne Hernandez and I'm here to assist you today. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Wayne, my name is Madison Rodriguez.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Madison. Can I have your phone number starting with the area code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, six seven eight, nine zero one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. And could you also provide me with the first four digits of your home address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's two five six zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Madison. I have noted your contact details. Is there anything specific you would like to discuss regarding our pricing today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit nervous about the price range of your vehicles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Madison. We strive to offer competitive rates. Thank you for sharing your thoughts with me today. If you need further assistance, feel free to contact us anytime. Have a wonderful day!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time. Goodbye.
